name: create_file
summary: Creates and populates a text file with the given content.
description: This function dynamically generates a text file with a specified name and writes provided content into it. It's useful in situations where there's a need to generate text-based files dynamically, such as creating configuration files, generating reports, or storing data in simple formats like CSV or JSON.

args.name: file_name
args.description: The complete file path and name of the file to be created. It includes both the directory path and the filename.

args.name: content
args.description: The string content that will be written into the file.

return_value.description: This function doesn't return anything. It performs an action by creating and populating a file with the given content.
